articles.description: Melbourne City's Rhali Dobson has an emotional farewell to football, with the former Matilda scoring a goal in her last W-League match and saying "yes" to a marriage proposal.
articles.content:
Melbourne City's Rhali Dobson was left stunned but overjoyed when the final match of her distinguished football career had the most unexpected fairytale ending.
